Read book
Find book, grab book, fin bookmark, sit down somewhere comfortable, open book, read book, close book after reading.


[WALK] <desk> (1.357)
[FIND] <novel> (1.1000)
[FIND] <bookmark> (1.1001)
[GRAB] <bookmark> (1.1001)
[FIND] <couch> (1.352)
[SIT] <couch> (1.352)
[GRAB] <novel> (1.1000)
[READ] <novel> (1.1000)
[PUTBACK] <bookmark> (1.1001) <novel> (1.1000)
